SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The Abstract Class creates queries using Reflection, and it's extended by ClientDAO, ProductDAO and OrderDAO classes.
Bill
The Bill Record Class holds the specific fields for a Bill: id, id of the Order, time of the order and total amount of money.
BillBLL
This class implements insert methods for Bills using DAO classes.
BillDAO
 
Client
The Client Class holds the specific fields for a Client: id, name, email and phone.
ClientBLL
This class implements all CRUD methods for Clients using DAO classes.
ClientDAO
 
ClientOperations
This class implements a window for client operations: add new client, edit client, delete client, view all clients in a table.
ConnectionFactory
The ConnectionFactory Class makes the connection with SQL possible.
Main
Here I call for the StartInterface class to launch my application.
OrderBLL
This class implements all CRUD methods for Orders using DAO classes.
OrderDAO
 
OrderItem
The Order Class holds the specific fields for an Order: id, id of the Client, id of the Product and the quantity of the product.
OrderOperations
This class implements a window for creating product orders.
Product
The Product Class holds the specific fields for a Product: id, name, price and stock.
ProductBLL
This class implements all CRUD methods for Products using DAO classes.
ProductDAO
 
ProductOperations
This class implements a window for product operations: add new product, edit product, delete product, view all products in a table.
StartInterface
This class allows the user to select which subjects he wants to manage: Clients, Products or Orders.
